name: Project UNSEEK
description:
A group of high schoolers went on a supposedly fun road trip. Unbeknownst to them, they were brought to another dimension. Realizing something was off, they decided to run away. What will happen to them?

In Project UNSEEK, you and up to seven other players will be randomly divided into two teams: 6 Humans and 2 Creatures to compete and survive in a mysterious experiment held by a shady researcher.

Survive the Experiment!

As humans, you must escape the experiment by hacking the system and avoiding being captured by creatures. As creatures, you must capture or avoid the humans to escape before the time runs out.

Diverse cast of Characters to Play with each Unique Skill

Play as a colorful High Schooler and Mythical Creature cast inspired by 80's slasher horror movies, SCP urban legend, science fiction, and even local folklore with each unique skill and trait.

Items to help your Mission

Humans can utilize basic items scattered in the maps or use Human Signature items that are tied to each character to finish the objective.

Survive in Style!

Using only in-game points, you can personalize all characters with a set of outfits and cosmetics you can mix and match!
